tag_list: recruitment, ireland, qt, android-and-iphone-development, c, java, -net, sql, plsql-development, database-administration
overview: Barry Vickers has been recruiting in IT since 2003, specifically in IT contracting across all technologies including Qt, Android and iPhone development, C++, Java, .Net, SQL, PL/SQL Development, Database Administration (SQL/Oracle/Sybase etc) as well as System Support (Windows/Unix, networking etc) as well as BI/MIS (such as Business Objects, Crystal Reports, Hyperion etc) and ERP/CRM (SAP. Oracle, PeopleSoft, JD Edwards etc).
